casebody.data:
Francis ANDERSON
v.
Charles DIKE et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 20, 2019

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn.App. 405, 202 A.3d 448 (2019), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
